A clear, concise description of the bug.

1. Start a new tank
2. Do this...
3. Then this...
4. See the bug

## Expected Behavior
What should happen instead.

## Actual Behavior
What actually happened (include any error messages).

## Environment
- **OS:** Windows / macOS / Linux
- **App Version:** 1.0.0 (or "dev" if running from source)
